descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Joel Embiid shares that he told teammates he wanted to get Andre Drummond to foul out before Saturday's game, but it was all in good fun.
videos.headline: Embiid's goal was to foul Drummond out

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Presser (Embiid's goal was to foul Drummond out) 2017/12/03 ESHEET
